divs: Sighting DetailsWas shoveling out snow out of my drive way with 2 friends. As i was shoveling the lights and electricity dimmed and a bright blue flash lit up the entire night sky. mind that the sky wzs pitch black because of the snow. Me and my friends were wondering waht that was. we were in shock but got back to shoveling. In the next 2 minutes another bright blue flash came and it was brighter than the first. what followed next was creepy. best buy and other industrial business' poower went out. the block on my side of the rode lsot power. we went back into the house and found out that our appliances reseted. like the times reseted, but we had not lsot power. we went back out to check if the flash would happen again but it never did. very shociking experience. by the way not a power outage line breaking becuse this was direclty overhead and "travel" across the sky. This looked like the "wormhole" picture.
